ai-patthana12.1:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.1:0.3_0: There are causes and reasons for this.
ai-patthana12.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana12.1:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of thought that gives rise to sorrow.
ai-patthana12.1:3.1_0: Three things that rely on one ground ...
ai-patthana12.1:4.1_0: For the sake of purification, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.1:5.1_0: Nor does cause or reason for the sake of purification of thought, not for the sake of a principle.
ai-patthana12.1:6.1_1: He should not do one of the same kind of work,
ai-patthana12.1:6.1_2: He doesn’t have the bathing, going to the Buddhist sect, nor a single straight path ...
ai-patthana12.1:7.1_0: No cause for the reason why for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.1:8.1_0: For the sake of deference, not for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana12.1:8.1_1: Not for the sake of a reason for the sake of cause,
ai-patthana12.1:9.1_0: The sake of one relies on the four supports. ...
ai-patthana12.1:10.1_0: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of cause, causes and conditions.
ai-patthana12.1:10.1_1: Not cause or reason for the sake of a cause, the reason for the sake of cause, cause and reason.
ai-patthana12.1:10.1_2: No cause for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.1:11.1_0: Not cause or reason for the sake of a cause, the reason why a cause of cause and reason.
ai-patthana12.1:11.1_1: Not cause or reason for the sake of a cause, the reason for the sake of cause, not for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana12.1:11.1_2: Not cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.1:12.1_0: No cause or reason for the sake of cause or condition for the sake of cause, nor for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana12.1:12.1_1: No cause or reason for the sake of cause or condition for the sake of cause, nor for the sake of order.
ai-patthana12.1:12.1_2: No cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.1:14.1_0: No to cause for the sake of purification by for the sake of investigating, or for the sake of people.
ai-patthana12.1:15.1_0: Three things that rely on one ground ...
ai-patthana12.1:16.1_0: for the sake of not for the sake of investigating, nor for the sake of people.
ai-patthana12.1:17.1_0: Not for the sake of loss, not for the sake of deconfaction, ... for the sake of purification of mind.
ai-patthana12.1:18.1_0: Not for the sake of investigating, nor for the sake of fun, nor for the sake of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana12.1:19.1_0: (These nine discourses should be expanded in line with the previous set.)
ai-patthana12.1:20.1_0: For the sake of purification, neither for the sake of cause nor reason.
ai-patthana12.1:21.1_0: Not knowing and seeing cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana12.1:22.1_0: For the sake of purification by for the sake of investigating, nor for the sake of principle.
ai-patthana12.1:23.1_0: No cause for the sake of purification, both for the sake of deceiveness and for the sake of principle, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana12.1:24.1_0: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of a cause, the reason for the sake of cause, cause, condition, and reason for the sake of cause.
ai-patthana12.1:25.1_0: (This should not give rise to diversity of things.)
